# claudeworkshop.com

> Professional Claude Code training for engineering teams.

## About

Claude Workshop provides in-house and offsite training programs to help engineering teams master AI-assisted development with Claude Code. We train teams at Fortune 100 and DAX 40 companies.

## Training Programs

- Foundation: Introduction to AI-assisted development with Claude Code
- Professional: Advanced workflows and team integration
- Enterprise: Organization-wide AI transformation with custom solutions

## Key Pages

- /training - All training programs
- /training/foundation - Foundation program details
- /training/professional - Professional program details
- /training/enterprise - Enterprise program details
- /methodology - Our DRO (Delegate, Review, Own) framework
- /about - About the founders and company
- /contact - Get in touch

## Framework

We teach the DRO Framework:
- Delegate: Hand off repetitive tasks to AI (boilerplate, tests, docs)
- Review: AI proposes, you decide (bug fixes, refactoring)
- Own: Human judgment required (architecture, security, business logic)

## Contact

For training inquiries: /contact
